message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product for $11500. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm afraid I can't go as low as $9500. I can meet you halfway, though - how about $10750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I can go up to $10200, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm glad we're close, but I think I can do better than $10200. How about we meet at $10800? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above your last offer. I can go up to $10500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
